choices: You shrink in your boss's office.
You shrink at the local pool.
You shrink while Vicki is babysitting.
1.content:
You randomly shrink and you are forced to get help...

At your boss's office. You work as an assistant for Ms. Linda. A short, brunette who is a true bitch. One day you go into her office to talk to her about an idea you had to track training into an organized excel file when you realize she is not there yet. However, your head goes dizzy and you end up stumbling to her computer desk to use as a support. The room seems to be growing bigger around you while spinning at the same time. You sprawl out onto the desk and make a weak moan for help that goes unheard. By the time the dizziness stops, you realize you are lying on a flat surface. Looking up and around, you realize you are shrunk to _______ on your boss's desk! The office is like a new world to you now and you will need Ms. Linda's help to survive in this big, big world.

____________________________________________________________________________ ________________

You live in a neighborhood that has a pool. It is a particularly hot, summer day. Your A/C isn't working and the repairman won't be there until tomorrow. Of course it's your day off for the next two days and you can't even much stay in your own house without suffering heat stroke with all your fans on full blast. Instead, you decide to cool off at the neighborhood pool. You go through the fence with your key to see that there is a lifeguard who looks to be anywhere from 16 to 18 on an elevated chair. You see a red-headed woman in her early twenties, around your age, resting on her stomach on a lawn chair in her purple bikini. You are about to pick out a lawn chair when suddenly the world starts to rapidly grow around you. It doesn't take long for you to realize that you're actually shrinking!

____________________________________________________________________________ _________________

Same concept as above. You instead decide to drive to the beach. For right now the beach is almost completely empty besides a life guard station just a couple hundred yards away. Realizing you forgot to bring a towel to use to lay on top of the sand, you contemplate walking up to the stores to get one before you suddenly start to shrink to a insignificant size. Unfortunately for you, the beach is starting to populate. Although this may be a blessing if you are trying to get help, but can anyone distinguish you from the grains of sand?

____________________________________________________________________________ _________________

You are in your early twenties and still live at home with your mom, Tracy. She's in her mid forties with a slightly thick build and although she retains beauty she is getting older. She nags you a good amount even though you do have a job and you're just waiting for that pay raise so you can finally move out. You also have your eighteen year old sister, Vicki, who can seem to do no wrong in the eyes of your mother. You don't talk to her that much anymore and mostly steer clear as she can be a bitch sometimes.

On this night, your mom is out with some friends while your sister is in the living room babysitting two girls; Haley, 10 and Marcy, 7. You end up randomly shrinking while you are in your room playing video games. Now you need to go get help.
1.title: Start

12.content:
In a panic, you run under the cover of a lawn chair. Just by being next to one of the thick support bars under the chair, you could tell that you were about an inch tall, maybe less. The pool complex stretched for miles on end from any given direction and the pool itself is like an ocean to you. What are you going to do? People don't just shrink! This is impossible, you don't even know if the doctors would know how to fix you but one thing for certain is you don't want to be stuck at this size without trying to find a way to get help or get even smaller if you wait!

You have options around the pool even though it will require you to leave the shade of under this chair and into the oppressive sun for a long journey.

There's the red-headed woman, around 18 or 20 years old laying on her stomach, she's the closest one so she makes sense to go to right now. There's the teen life guard on her elevated chair, she's a lifeguard, it's her job to help you! Then across the other side of the pool is that mother and her kid, the advantage of going there is the mother is on a lower chair that touches the ground allowing you to get to her easily. Then there is the kid in the sand box. Maybe you can run in front of her while she's playing and she'll see you and get you to an adult for help.

You decide to...
12.title: Pool Relaxation

121.content: The redhead is closer, so you try to get her attention. You run towards her as fast as you can. As soon as you get near her...
121.title: Head for the red-head.

choices: Kicks you free from the shoe
Puts the shoe on, with you in it
122.content:
This wasn't going to work. The chair is the size of a building, and she's perched upon the very top. Her bare feet hang closer to the ground, but even then they're yards above you. You sigh, sitting on her black pool shoes.

The ground begins to shake with powerful steps. You fall over onto the shoe, helpless as you watch the little girl from earlier run over. The sickening sound of wet skin slapping against dry concrete floods past, forcing you to cower further into the shoe. She begins to speak, her voice a bellowing thunderstorm from the heavens. "Miss Lifeguard lady, can you help me? I dropped my floaty toy into the deep end and I want it back."

You spare a glance at the teen girl. Her feet swing impatiently above, each a threat to your life. "Alright sweetie, I'll help." You grimace as she dismounts the chair, her feet landing to the sides of the shoes. You watch in awe as she moves, more swiftly than anything her size has the right. Her steps head in your direction, as she...
122.title: Lifeguard Tower

1222.content: The teen girl's glistening pale feet swiftly approach you as she begins to wear her shoes. You are knocked into the shoe as she puts them on. It is no pleasant experience either, as her feet are covered in sweat from the long day. The smell is sickening, like a vinegeary odor from hell, the teen girl walks over to the deep end and reaches out to grab the pool toy. She hands the girl it and walks back to her chair.
1222.title: Puts the shoe on, with you in it

12221.content: She begins walking faster, and you slip underneath her foot. You are trapped underneath, until suddenly, someone begins drowning, she hops of the chair, with you under her shoe, and you are crushed.
12221.title: She leaves her shoes on

14.content:
It's just past seven at night. Your mom and some friends went out for a night of fun and one of those friends dropped off her daughters here. Thankfully Vicki, your younger sister, is here to watch them because you have a splitting headache and just want to be left alone since coming home from work. All you have to do is stay in your room and you won't have to deal with any of them. Whether it's the little girls or Vicki. So far it's been a peaceful night to start. You are sitting on your chair near your desk, playing some video games. If you pause your game you can hear the sound of the living room TV, no doubt where your sister and the girls are at, but it's not loud enough for you to complain just yet.

While playing your game, your headache grows so bad, you have to pause your game. The world around you seems to spin and when you get some clarity to focus your vision; you notice everything around you is growing! Your still on your computer chair but your legs are starting to hover above the floor as you are getting too short! You get off the chair and your shorts and boxers instantly fall down your legs as they are too baggy to be snug around your waist. Before you know it, your shirt does the same and now your chair you were just sitting on is towering over you!

"Vicki!!!!!!" You cry out, not knowing what the hell is going on but between your weakening voice through your loss of height, the closed door and the living room TV's volume; there is no way anyone can hear you.

As you rapidly lose more height, you try to cry out again as loud as you possibly can but there is no response or quieting of the ambient noise beyond your room. You run to your bedroom door but the doorknob towers above, way out of reach. You bang on the door with your fists but the noise is minimal. Soon the headache intensity stops and the world seems to stop growing but now you are only a couple of inches tall. The headache is still there and you feel that it has something to do with you shrinking. You figure that you need to get help before you shrink even more! The thought of getting smaller than this is frightening to you. Just looking at a discarded sneaker nearby, you realize that you could easily get squished without someone even noticing!

Turning your attention to getting out of this room, you know you'll never be able to open the door but the gap under the door is just large enough to crawl under. You do just that, laying on your thick carpet, you slither below the wooden wall and soon find yourself in the hallway. The hallway is now a vast corridor that resembles a large highway that would take time to cross to get from what side to the other. Down this corridor, hundreds of yards away, you see the living room and its couches. On the couch you have a direct view of you sister laying on her back with her head turned to the side to watch the TV.

Walking down the hallway takes several minutes as you notice the sound of the TV getting louder and louder, to the point where it vibrates your insides similar to a movie theater audio set. Soon enough, you make it to the end of the hallway and around the corner to get a full view of the living room, or at least what part of the couches in front of you don't obstruct. Along with your sister on the couch, you see a giant girl, Marcy, on the floor playing with a dollhouse while several dolls and accessories litter the floor around her. On an adjacent couch is an older but young girl, Haley, laying on her stomach and playing a handheld game.

You go to...
14.title: Spread Thin

choices: climb her arm, and try to get her attention.
stay where you are and wait.
141.content:
You don't want to end up as a plaything for the Girls, so you decide to Head towards Vicki, going from underneath one piece of furniture to the next, until you eventually reach the couch.
The journey took you a good amount of time and it seems like Vicki has fallen asleep, judging by the Heavy breathing and her Hand dangling of the couch, touching the ground right next to you.

You choose to...
141.title: Vicki

1411.content:
By now you are the size of an ant. The living room is a massive cityscape with the furniture and decorations seeming like sky scrapers and the giants in the room are like living mountains. You made it to the side of the couch but your heart is sunk to see that Vicki has her eyes closed and lets loose roaring sounds of light snoring. You feel like she would see you if she opened her eyes and looked down slightly but then again, you are very tiny. The reality of someone looking down you and not noticing you even though they are only a few feet away is still unfathomable. You need to get Vicki's attention, even with her asleep, you would rather get her attention by waking her up than go to younger girls in such a crucial and dire situation.

The way up the couch is an impossible climb. The gap under the couch is way over your head and there are only four wooden beams touching the ground at each corner of the long couch, meaning you will not be able to reach the material of the couch and climb up to reach the sofas that Vicki is laying on. There are her train sized fingers just ahead though. You would climb up those and up her arm which is dangled to the ground at a steep incline but still gentle enough to walk up.

Taking a deep breath, you walk to the fingers, going through thick carpet that is up to your knees. Her pink nails are the first thing touching the carpet and provide a sort of ramp for you to walk to her finger tips. You do this on her middle finger and soon make it to the large tip of the finger where you use the grooves of her fingerprints for handholds to climb up the tip. Her skin is warm which provides much needed body heat as the air is so expansive around you that it is freezing since you can't retain your own heat. That being said, you still maintain chills as you realize that Vicki could inadvertently close her fingers and crush you into nothing without noticing. This makes you quicken your pace through the lengthy finger and onto her palm. You can't help but note that your life is literally in the palm of her hand as you traverse to her wrist. You can feel the blood flowing through her skin from under your feet. It feels so weird to feel the rush of it like some kind of river under her warm, skin. Your feet sink into the flesh slightly making your walks awkward as you go up her arm. Now you want to travel slower because you fear that you might make her think she has an itch and she will scratch you with those monstrous fingers or she may wake up from your movements and quickly dismiss you as a bug before smacking you down into a pulp with her palm or splatter your body on her fingernail by trying to flick you away.

Eventually you are able to make it up near her shoulder where you have to climb up the sleeve of her t-shirt. It's comforting to be off of her bareskin but the view just has you in shock. The first thing you notice are her mountainous boobs just yonder and past those is her slender stomach leading to her short gym shorts before her extremely long legs. Your sister was now a landscape that stretched seemingly a mile. Looking towards her face, it was like viewing Rushmore from afar except her face is even bigger and you are still a distance away.

You think about how to get her attention. If she wasn't sleeping, you think you could just run in front of her eyes as she should notice you as a human from so close but that won't work now. She might be able to feel you but you hear getting instinctively swatted away and crushed. The only option is getting to her ear and yelling inside. You figure that surely she would be able to hear that. With her head turned to the side while she rested on her back, you would just have to route along her neck and traverse up her face and partially through her hair to reach the ear.

With this plan set, another thought that made you guilty arose. Although the situation is dire, you cannot help but be turned on by the massive body you are on. Even the scent of her soap and lotion is intoxicating at this point. You know it would be very dumb and dangerous but perhaps you could detour to explore her body for a few minutes or so and then get her help. Who knows when you will get another opportunity like this after all?

You decide to...
1411.title: Up and Up

14112.content:
You decide to explore her body a bit. You walk up and down her body.

Does she feel you?
14112.title: do some exploring.

choices: Go to the dollhouse for refuge.
1412.content:
By now you two inches tall. The living room is the size of a large town now with the furniture and decorations seeming like tall buildings and the giants in the room are like living skyscrapers. You made it to the side of the couch but your heart is sunk to see that Vicki has her eyes closed and lets loose roaring sounds of light snoring. You feel like she would see you if she opened her eyes and looked down slightly but then again, you are very tiny. The reality of someone looking down you and not noticing you even though they are only a few feet away is still unfathomable. You need to get Vicki's attention, even with her asleep, you would rather get her attention by waking her up than go to younger girls in such a crucial and dire situation.

The way up the couch is an impossible climb. The gap under the couch along with the distance from the four wooden beams touching the ground at each corner of the long couch has the material of the couch just out of reach for you to climb up. There are her long fingers just ahead though. Until Vicki moves her arm up to the sofa with the rest of her body. Your heart races as you think she is waking up but instead she made the movement in her sleep.

The only choice you have now is to scream at the top of your lungs for Vicki to wake up and look down at you every time the TV is at a brief stopping of sound between commercials or shows. It's all futile as your tiny voice is just too small for Vicki's ears to give attention to especially since she is asleep. Maybe if she was more alert she could hear you but it's an impossibility for sure as of now.

Realizing it is pointless, you have no choice but to just wait until she wakes up. It could be hours but Vicki is usually awake well into the early morning on weekends so it is very uncharacteristic for her to be asleep right now. You hope she is just dozed off but it could be her lack of sleep catching up to her.

Looking back, you see if there's the desperate option of the younger girls available but you are surprised to no longer see their hulking bodies. No wonder it's so quiet besides the television now. Further across the living room, you see the girls sleeping next to each other on one couch. Leaving them as a similar situation to Vicki except they definitely won't be awake anytime soon.

"There goes that idea", you grunt aloud.

You are starting to feel tired yourself as you continue to watch Vicki intently. Maybe it might be a good idea to get rest somewhere safer until your energy is up. Past the living room table is something that catches your eye. The girls' dollhouse. The simple, pink, plastic house that was rather small before is now an estate to you. With everyone sleeping, maybe you could use it as a temporary refuge to get some rest yourself.

You decide to...
1412.title: What Now?

choices: Suck on you & play the game.
Give you to her younger sister.
143.content:
You decided that getting the attention of the oldest blonde girl on the couch would be smartest given how your sister & you never get along, figuring she'd show you to the others anyhow. As you were creeping around the couchside Vicki got up from the couch & left the room, not seeing you, like a moving building & quite scary. The blanket that covers the couch reached the floor & is made of felt, so the climb is smooth despite your size.

Haley is engrossed in her game, your unfortunately unable to see her until getting to the top. Once you do get to the top your worn out, seeing your at her leggings covered hip. There is surely no way she'll notice you here seeing as she's laying her head on a blanket & playing. There is only two ways to get to her face, one being to climb on her & go along her back & over her long hair to get to her face or dangerously climb up & on the blanket, possibly get swatted away if she is startled.
Going with the seemingly safest route as to hopefully not be maimed you anxiously approach her tank top, clutching the fabric at her waist hard & heaving yourself up. She shifts some as you ascend, just her hips movement almost throwing you off, but you manage.

On her lower back you see that the younger girl is still playing with dolls, now seeing the curvature of Haley's buttock, legs & back. Continuing up to her hair getting to her front is smooth as it's easy to climb with, so going on with some fear you held onto her hair & slid down it- into her vision.

So to shock she doesn't freak out upon seeing a tiny, maybe inch-&-a-half naked guy walk near her hand on the blanket & yell, "H-hey! Haley-! Help!" A bit unnerved as her blue eyes look down at you she is silent, then smiling & glancing at her playing sister then back to you doesn't ease it. Maybe this was a bad idea.
Not saying anything she proceeded to scoop you in her hand.. & do what?
143.title: Haley.

choices: You suddenly shrink while visiting a friend.
Hiding in living room after testing shrinking potion, mom came home early.
Shrinking on the way to your girlfriend's house.
15.content:
You are in your later twenties. Your life is in order and everything is going good. You just visited your hometown and now you're on the way back when you get a text from a girl you used to hang out with in high school. You still keep in touch and text very regularly, now she's a single mom with her own house. Man the times change! She's super nice and you'd love to see her and hang out to chat in person before going back on your drive, so you make the small detour to her neighborhood. After you get to her house and she answers the door, you walk in and start talking but a small headache that you've had all day gets worst. That's not even the bad part, your friend, Xena, exclaims that you are getting shorter!

____________________________________________________________________________ _____________

Catered around the setting of shrinking at your house on the first page. Your mom is out with some friends to drink, she won't be home until well past midnight if she doesn't just crash at one of their houses and your younger sister is sleeping over at a "friend's" house. Probably some guy, but whatever. Now you can finally test your shrinking potion. You found these two bottles on the parking lot after work one day. One was labeled, "Shrink" and the other labeled, "Antidote". You've always fantasized about shrinking and with those two gone you could see if this works and then grow yourself back after exploring. The potion indeed works. You are about two feet tall when you decide to walk to the living room and gaze around there. Too bad you hear a car door close, it must be your mom coming home early! What do you do?
____________________________________________________________________________ _______________

You are eighteen years old and on the way to your girlfriend's house after creating a shrinking formula. You don't even tell her about it, wanting to surprise her but first you will have to get past her bratty little sister and mom who doesn't like you.

(1st person story)

____________________________________________________________________________ _______________

You are at a local gym when disaster strikes. You shrink just when you are about to use free weights and now the gym is starting to get more and more people showing up. Only now they are giants to you. What will you do?
15.title: Other scenarios

choices: Hide under the living room table.
Run down the hallway into a bedroom.
152.content:
You do not want your mom to see you at this two foot tall size and freak out and you also do not want her or anyone to know about the size formulas. The only thing you can do is hide but you do not have much time as the door knob is starting to turn!

Without hesitation, you decide to quickly....
152.title: Home Early

154.content:
You realized that not only you'd shrunk to the size of a 1/16th inch flea, you'd also shrunk inside the women's locker room.

You suddenly start to panic when a group of women who were in their mid-twenties entered the locker room to change and take showers.

One of the giantesses who entered the locker room was an attractive woman who was twenty-five years old and had hair that was black as a raven.

She was, unawarefully, walking towards you because her locker was right next to you.

Suddenly, a giant feminine tennis shoe slammed right next to you, and you let out a scream of terror.

The giantess soon took off her tennis shoes and socks, revealing her indigo and black painted toenails.

Suddenly, you felt an erection from the smell of the giantess' feet.

It was a complete shame on your face. Because you were a forty-five year old man and she was twenty years your junior.

You also a had wife and two teenage daughters.

But now you had a sexual desire for this giantess, which made you sick to your stomach.

As soon as the giantess took off her entire gym clothes and was completely naked from head to toe, your sexual urges grew ever more stronger as well as the shame on your face.

You had to the urge to masturbate towards this attractive giantess, when suddenly another woman entered the locker room.

She was an attractive woman in her mid-forties who had beautiful orange-red hair and beautiful electric blue iris on her eyes.

Her upper lips had pink-red lipstick on it and her bottom lips had black lipstick on it.

Her fingernails and toenails were also pink-red and black.

She wore a pair of smelly black high-heel shoes.

She then walk right towards you to her locker and put out a locker key.

You suddenly were in shock because this giantess was your...
154.title: Shrunk at the gym

choices: You shrink in the women's restroom of a bar.
155.content:
You decide to go for a night of bar hopping. Unfortunately, after leaving the taxi for the very first bar; your head starts to hurt. After showing your ID to the bouncer to go in but with your headache getting worst, you don't want to order drinks. You decide to go to the restroom to collect yourself. You end up accidentally walking into the female restroom but no one is in there and no one outside noticed. You don't even care as your head continues to spin, you close your eyes. When you open them, your head feels much better but now the bathroom is a vast environment! You shrunk to the size of a flea, perhaps a little bigger but still very tiny! What do you do?

____________________________________________________________________________ _________________

You are about eighteen years old and at your best friend's house. After crashing at his place, he gets a call early in the morning forcing him to go to work very early. Now you are left in his room to get up and go home whenever you desire. You figure you would sleep for a couple more hours and then head out but first you could use a drink. Instead of heading downstairs to the kitchen, you find an old soda bottle next to you that is half filled with some kind of cola. You drink the extremely flat soda figuring it is better than nothing. Unfortunately, the soda is just the perfect storm with the temperatures, air, bacteria, time and the biological properties of the person drinking it to be the world's first and only shrinking formula. You will be in for a surprise when you wake up...
155.title: More.

1553.content:
The air conditioning is still broken in your house on this hot summer day. To make matters worst; the local pool is closed for cleaning and your car is acting funny so you don't want to risk driving it to the beach. However, you do have those two dusty bottles in your medicine cabinet; one labeled, "Shrink" the other labeled, "Antidote".

You remember finding them back when you lived with your mom and sister. Across the street, the neighbors filled up a kiddie pool earlier in the day but have since went inside. Maybe you can shrink yourself and chill in the pool, and then go back inside your house when you're ready to grow?

____________________________________________________________________________ ___________

The family reunion is at your mom's house, however, you are in the middle of an addiction to vore. You want to be fed to someone, even though it means sure death. You just can't think logically, you want this to happen to you. With that shrinking potion, you can make it a reality. But who's plate do you go on?
1553.title: Others

choices: The pool owner's older sister comes to empty the pool.
The little girl who owns the pool returns.
15531.content:
Blowing the dust off the shrinking potion, you twist open the bottle and then gulp down some of the formula before closing it back up. You know the effects will be quick at first so you waste no time. You put the shrinking potion back into the cabinet and grab the antidote before walking to your living room. You'll need this to grow back but you won't be able to carry it around with you when you shrink so you set it down on the floor.

Your clothes are already feeling loose and the objects in the room are getting bigger. You walk to your front door and crack it open. Soon you are to the point where you are looking up at the door knob and your clothes are heavy and useless to keep on your body. You let them fall to the ground so that you are completely naked. Now you need to wait until you get smaller so that freaks out at the sight of a toddler sized man walking around naked.

Soon enough, you are having to crane your neck all the way back to look up at the door knob as the door extends tens of feet above. Your living room is large enough to fit a neighborhood of houses. You predict that you are somewhere around four to six inches tall. This should be small enough to get across the street and enjoy that pool.

You walk through the cracked open front door, although the opening is more like a corridor sized gap. The heat from the outdoors instantly afflicts your body, even under the shade of the porch. Your goal across the street is seemingly thousands of feet. You jog down your driveway and to the curb. While doing this, you can't help but feel very awkward as you are naked and extremely vulnerable at this height. If somebody was walking down the sidewalk and saw you, you'd be at their mercy completely. You think about playing dead and hoping you are mistaken for a doll if such a thing happens.

Crossing the street is also gut wrenching. The jagged, rocky ground hurts your feet even more at this size and the thought of a car passing by any moment is an unshakable fear. No one would be able to notice you from inside a vehicle and you don't think you'd truly be able to dodge if you are on the path of a speeding behemoth's tire.

Thankfully, no such thing happens and you are jogging up the curb of your neighbor's yard before stopping on the grass to take some breaths. The tall grass blades are up to your chest in height. If someone was coming, you could at least lay down to get hidden like this. You hear a clicking sound and look down at the source to see a beetle the size of a house cat is scurrying away. Bugs being this size compared to you is quite discomforting. It reminds you that some animals might actually view you as prey now, so you'll need to be careful. Even the venom on small spiders and ants might now be enough to actually be a dangerous poison at this size.

You carefully trod through the grass and make it to the base of the blue kiddie pool. The pool's plastic walls extend up for some distance. It was way to smooth to climb up with no hand holds. That's when you notice a long stick from a fallen branch just nearby. The stick is very heavy buy you are able to angle it to rest on the edge of the pool. Now you wrap yourself around it and shimmy up until, eventually, you reach the edge of the pool.

By now you are covered in sweat and the effort may have no been worth the result but you were determine and now you are hear. Below is clear, pristine water as the pool resembles a lake. It must be twelve to eighteen feet deep which makes this dive completely safe...

Jumping off the edge, you land with a large splash into the cool water. The rush of the fall was exhilarating and the water on your skin, refreshing. You swim around above and underwater for a few minutes before swimming to the pool walls to rest your back against it as support while kicking your legs. You think this is even better than the local pool. It's way bigger and you don't have to share with anyone......
15531.title: Rest Up

15533.content:
You are a 14yr high school freshman. Your older sister,Moira, is the valedictorian of her senior year, 18, beautiful, 5'8", one of the most popular girls in school, smart[like you, being in a family heavily in the field of technology with your parents being Nobel prize winning scientists], athletic, peppy, and recently heartbroken. Your high school is implementing the S.T.E.M. program, requiring all students at each grade level to participate in a science fair. You feel indifferent about it, but Moira is worried about it, completely off guard. Sure, she's won all the way to the national level in each science fair she's worked in, but she hasn't done any science fairs since the 5th grade. Wanting to calm down your older sister, you say that you both should work on a project. She is thankful and accepts.

You both build a device able to break the laws of physics themselves, altering size and mass, Invulnerability, enhancingstrength, speed, intelligence, and endurance. Even making opaque objects invisible.
days before the science fair, your friends tell you that you can't both get the grade because you aren't in the same grade level. Now you have to choose to take the project for yourself, or finish the code and let your sister get the grade. Either way you shrink and are at the mercy of Moira. (Your parents are staying at a science convention for 2 months so no them.)
15533.title: Others.

155331.content:
Will you take the project for yourself and leave Moira to fend for herself?...

Or...

Finish the last bit of code and let Moira get the credit?
155331.title: Decisions, decisions. ..

1553311.content: You stay up late finishing the code. Afterwards, heading into your room to tell Moira (she slept there while you finished ) that the alteration ray [looks like a FN P90 with green light streaked around it, currently mounted on a tripod] is finished. Before you could go to her, your computer was flashing a error and a warning, before you could reach the computer to fix the problem, the alternator fired, hitting you and shrinking you to the size of a strawberry seed. As you free-falled, you landed...
1553311.title: Finish up the code

choices: You try to crawl out while she wears them
15533111.content:
You realize that you shrank and landed in your sisters left boot to her favorite pair of boots. She wore them everywhere, but she tried to keep them from getting too stinky and worn. 1553322.content:
You start the story on your 12th birthday. Nobody shows up to the party, and after getting nothing but clothing from your family, you go to sleep miserable, wishing that you could disappear from the world forever and nobody but you would know where you went.

You wake up in total darkness, on a hard flat surface. After feeling your way around the area, you conclude you are trapped in a room with either no doors or a door on the ceiling which you cannot reach. You are about to panic when everything starts shaking and light pours in from above...

That's not quite the whole story, though!

You start the story on your 12th birthday. Nobody shows up to the party, and after getting nothing but clothing from your family, you go to sleep miserable, wishing that somebody, anybody would give you the best gift they could to make up for this otherwise horrible birthday.

You wake up the next morning to find a small gift box labeled to you, with no giver on the tag. Curious, you undo the old-fashioned ribbon laces and open the box to find... a miniature version of you?! Wait, no. The one-and-a-half-inch doppelganger is mostly made of plastic, maybe a bit of metal, except it moves and speaks just like a tiny you! Is it a tiny robot, or magic? You might never find out.

This story can switch POV between the two versions of the protagonist at any time. The smaller one is invincible to any and all injury thanks to either advanced materials or magical protection, but can still feel pain! The larger one cannot be hurt or feel much pain from any action his toy clone might try to inflict if there is a lot of conflict between the two. Once the box is open, your two selves might or might not suddenly have the ability to sense or even communicate with each other psychically (some sort of "clone-link").
1553322.title: Other Ideas

choices: In the far-off future year of 206X...
15533222.content:
In the 2060s, humanity has taken primitive technological concepts like the VR headsets, Augmented Reality, 3D printing, drones, and most importantly EEG helmet game controllers, much farther towards their logical conclusion.

Electroencephalographs (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electroenc...) were originally large scanning devices used to monitor brain activity in medical patients and (willing, of course) scientific subjects. By the second decade of the third millennium, lightweight EEG 'cradles' or 'helmets' that wrapped around the scalp would already use electromagnetic sensors and 'trainable software' to enable rudimentary input directly from the brain without any of the nasty 'neural implants' seen in the 'cyberpunk' fiction of the decades leading up to the invention of the EEG helmet. In the 2060s, this has advanced to the point where all computer interfaces, video game characters and virtual avatars, as well as drones all make at least partial use of the versatile control scheme. In other words, the BCI (Brain Computer Interface) was born and grew up.

Drones in the 2060s come in many shapes, sizes and types. The military, of course, makes use of the most advanced of these, the relatively dangerous 'greymorph' drones, such as the liquid-like greygoo and the particulate greycloud systems which are composed of nanobots. Even with the fact that they are only allowed to be controlled by one or more human minds, the danger of a software flaw allowing these military 'drones' to devour the Earth is considered so much of a risk that they are considered WMDs on their own, on par with nuclear and biological weapons and having never actually been used in a theater of war. Just in case, of course. Even nuclear weapons were used twice in history.

Of course, you aren't here for a lesson of future technology that isn't related to the theme of shrinking. In the 2060s, while such terrible creations as greymorphs are limited to military access and never used, pretty much anyone in a developed nation can afford some sort of drone controlled by a BCI. This is spurred on by the fact that despite the increased ability of IPAs (Intelligent Personal Assistants) to predict human actions, a 'true' or 'strong' AI has never been successfully created, although conspiracy theorists persist that the truth is that the AI(s) already secretly controls the world and simply has no need or desire to change anything.

From large mechanical spiders and insects painted in yellow and black caution stripes that are being used to construct the world's first arcologies, to hobby planes resembling the early 'Predator' drones which are merely RC toys that shoot foam projectiles and streams of water, drones are pervasive. They deliver pizzas and record news live. They are cars and security cameras and theme park mascots. When a person loses their legs, the prosthetics are controlled via the same BCI as, and in the same way as, a drone. In the home, the most common uses of drones are advanced descendants of the Roomba line of household cleaning robots which can cooperate to complete the homeowner's requests, but can also be individually controlled for fun or for accomplishing a task in a specific way or even just as a remotely controllable home security system.

What does any of this have to do with shrinking? Simple. Drones are hardly limited by size, cost or the now outdated concept of mass production. Any macrophile/microphile adult wanting to experience their kink can produce an 'anatomically correct' miniature drone replica of themselves or a 'victim' (who would of course actually be willing) and roleplay the fantasy to their heart's content (these will be the R-rated storylines). Such drones are globally given a maximum legal size of 10 feet (slightly larger than the tallest recorded living human), for reasons varying from structural and mechanical integrity of the drone to simple public safety. Since most 'pleasure-oriented drones' are used by non-macrophiles, a normal human character can't get close to that height and a human using a tall drone would not be much of a 'true giant'. That's where the miniature drones come in. Using augmented reality, the setting itself can be changed from a typical 2060s dwelling to retro-futuristic, fantasy or historic settings. Furniture is replaced by counterpart decor which is more suited to the setting, or alternatively they may become an entire city of miniature buildings and such. After that, an anatomically correct drone that is less than an inch high is just semantics and characterization.

In a similar but much more innocent manner, children will often create imaginative characters and produce a miniature drone of them using a 3D printer (these will be the G-rated storylines). Instead of merely playing with a toy, you can temporarily become it. Unlike the R-rated drones, toy character drones meant for use by kids are limited in maximum size to 9 inches, just short of the smallest baby ever born, in order to prevent minors from abusing the technology to harm others. Once again, augmented reality can provide the kids with sufficiently different imaginary worlds to play in. This also works well for tabletop RPGs which once used cardboard or paper maps, and cardboard or plastic character figurines, merging traditional tabletop RPGs and their computerized spinoffs JRPGs, WRPGs and MMORPGs (these will be the PG-13 storylines).

All this is possible thanks to a simple type of electronic device which is a combined EEG helmet, VR headset and AR glasses. There's no direct neural interface with which to pump data right into your brain, or way to copy your mind wholesale, so getting stuck in a drone body is practically impossible. As such, if you start out in the middle of a 'thing' with someone, 'logging out' has replaced the safeword in such a situation and thus will leave you high and dry.

The key word was practically. Maybe you saved up money or were already rich, and bought yourself one the new 'Haptic Chambers' which have only recently become available to people without a requirement of having at least one type of license which let you pilot restricted drone types such as military- or industrial-grade drones, only to discover that the new tech has a flaw or two that won't let you disengage the BCI and climb out of the chamber, forcing you to alert someone who can help using your tiny drone. In the G-rated storylines, you'd be an unlucky kid who is forced to do same... or a spoiled brat who quickly finds out that having the money for all the coolest toys doesn't mean you should get said toys, especially when they trap you in a body so small that you're at the mercy of all the people you snubbed.

Or maybe you're just an ordinary schmuck or unsuspecting child who uses the safe, tried and true BCI headset... and somehow, whether by extremely unlikely technological mishap, or ending up paralyzed while still using the headset, or even impossible magic/supernatural occurrence/dues ex machina that somehow traps you in the tiny drone despite the best efforts of lawsuit-fearing corporations, vote-yielding politicians, a technologically literate 2060s public mindset and scientists with plenty of foresight to spare.

Worst of all, the cause for this is that aside from the inability to send an emergency shutdown command through the BCI to escape with just a thought, the 'augmented reality' system overlaid on the video output from the camera 'eyes' of the drones in order to enable easy access to the secondary/backup interface is crippled, with the log out function completely disabled and all telecommunications channels from telephone to social media to email unable to connect. Even attempting to switch to a VR avatar, like one would multitask programs on an early 21st century computer, produces an indecipherable 'connection error' which can't even be looked up because the internet browser keeps claiming it can't find a LiFi signal.

Fortunately, you need not worry about dying. With the drones being literal electronic puppets to your puppeteer brain, destruction of the drone would merely forcibly log you out and disengage the BCI. That said, simply 'killing' the droid would be no small feat. Despite their tiny size, they are built to be durable, since both 'pleasure' and more wholesome types of entertaining uses would inevitably cause damage to droids that were not ruggedly constructed. Droids are also powered by wireless electricity transfer in this day and age, except in the cases of greyforms and the few drones meant to operate outside human civilization for extended periods. When jumping from a 50-story desk or even a 150-story window ledge cannot kill you on impact, and there is no battery to be drained (the wide range of wireless power transmitters is hard to escape at normal size, and smartgrids have made circuit breaker panels fully automated), then self-destruction to get back to your real body becomes a harder task than just going to somebody for help.
15533222.title: Other...

155332222.content: You are a 17 year old latina girl named Susan Garcia, and a junior in your high school when your 48 year old short, blonde science teacher, Ms. Smith calls you in after class. She shrinks you, leaving you at the mercy of the 5'3 giant curvy MILF of a teacher, who you have no idea of her intentions.
155332222.title: Other...

1553322222.content: How about this one. You are 24 and you live on a farm with many animals. One day while milking the cows you shrink. At first it's only an inch or two but it starts getting faster till your one inch tall..
1553322222.title: Farm time

15533222222.content:
You're middle thirty faithful husband, who has a perfect family. Your wife, Alisson, is the most beautiful woman that you ever have seen in your life and had a body that some men would kill for, She had light blue eyes with a golden long blonde hair, Her legs were long and beautiful like they were from a model. Her waist and lower stomach were finely curved and thin. She had large breasts.


Even, You had married her for ten years and she gave you one pretty daughter, that already ten years old. But she still perfect and beautiful and looks better than before! Because she always takes care of herself by doing exercises every single day at a local gym, while your wife is getting stronger and beautiful with her toned sharply body, you're getting fat and look older and weaker, because you always working hard in your business to make you family wealthy. And didn't give any time to take care of yourself like her at all.

But, you don't this is a "Big Problem" at all, until one day....

You woke up and see yourself, only 1 inch tall!
15533222222.title: other

info.brief_description: You shrink in a crazy scenario, will you survive/grow back?
info.description:
No rules, if you don't like something in here; simply make a chapter to steer it into your liking or avoid the chapter.

Death encouraged.

Stories based on specific chapter scenarios from other stories, my large collection of shrinking/gts vids and/or my imagination. Taking requests for scenarios.
